title: Technology-Enhanced Language Professional Competency Development: Reflective Learning-Based Online Course

context.prior_knowledge: Job-related language proficiency and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Language proficiency improvement reflecting workplace practical experience, with personalized feedback via learning data analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze challenging situations encountered during job-related language tasks and develop improvement strategies.
Learners can reset language learning goals through data-driven individual skill profile analysis.
Learners can diagnose language communication issues arising in team collaboration and propose solutions.

resources: Learning Analytics Tool (Skill/Reflective Writing/Learning Attitude Analysis)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
